text: I am proud to announce that the United States will donate ventilators to our friends in India. We stand with India and Narendra Modi during this pandemic. We’re also cooperating on vaccine development. Together we will beat the invisible enemy: US President Donald Trump #COVID19 https://t.co/nNSWLKxPBJ
